EmailTemplate.name: Independent's Guide.IG Lead Email 9
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, do you have the right tech to be independent?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=Consultant}}, The game has changed; if you're self-employed, you need the right technology to support your solo business. Since we can't all be IT experts, MBO Partners has created the Technology 101 downloadable guide <http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide/launch/technology-101>. It's packed with tips and tricks specifically tailored to the self-employed. If you have any further questions about independent consulting tech or being self-employed, please don't hesitate to ask. ___________________________________ Aassia Haq Chief Marketing Officer MBO Partners
e: communications@mbopartners.com <mailto:info@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
